title: Stonehearth
notes: Game starts. window shows but stops at "Radiant" Logo. Music continue play and I can close game by clicking on close window button. At default version (3.7-3) all the same except Logo (that doesn't shows).

When starting it shows an 'initialize MCI' error and a black window screen. Close popup error box. On top left click on space where the 'File' 'View' 'Game' 'Help' are but can't be seen. They will show along with a drop down menu. In 'File' menu select 'Goto main menu'. The music will start and the game will be playable. Clicking in the background black makes the menus disappear. Ctrl-Tab to another app window and back and they will be back. Playable during normal play.
title: Flashpoint Campaigns: Red Storm Player's Edition
